tasks.title: Theme: DEATH IS ONLY THE BEGINNING!
Game Loop
tasks.details:
- Use corpses of insects and animals to feed your plants
- Use traps to catch insects and animals
- Use mushrooms to decompose the bodies
- Resulting nutritions can be used to feed the plants
- Insects and animals eat plants; catch them before they eat all of them!

tasks.title: Features
tasks.details:
- Plants with thorns are more robust and protect other plants from beeing eaten
- Dirt walls protect plants; can be destroyed by insects and animals
- (No water needed?)
